xml:
Condyline<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Condylomata acuminata affecting the penis or the female external genitalia

To the skin

  • Adult

    Apply twice daily for 3 consecutive days, treatment may be repeated at weekly intervals if necessary for a total of five 3-day treatment courses, direct medical supervision for lesions in the female and for lesions greater than 4 cm2 in the male, maximum 50 single applications (‘loops’) per session (consult product literature).

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
